Package player

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IInventory
    An inventory of items is carried by a player.
    IPlayerDataBase
    An IPlayerDataBase object keeps track of the current player allowed to play.
    Player
    A Player is the main actor of the game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DummyPlayer
    A dummy implementation of TronPlayer.
    Inventory
    <<<<<<< HEAD An inventory of Items that is carried by a Player.
    InventoryTest  
    LightTrail
    LightTrail is an impenetrable wall (for other players) which trails the player.
    LightTrailDecorator
    Decorates a square so it is affected by a light trail.
    LightTrailTest  
    PlayerActionManager
    This class manages the actions of a player.
    PlayerDataBase
    This class will keep track of the players, and who is the current player.

    TronPlayer
    Main character of the Tron game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerState
    PlayerState controls the actions of a player.
    TurnEvent
    The TurnEvent is a signal that is sent to every observer which is interested in the execution of an action.
